awt_quant.portfolio.multi_factor_analysis.main

Module Contents

awt_quant.portfolio.multi_factor_analysis.main.run_multi_factor_analysis(symbols, start_date='2020-01-01', end_date='2022-01-01')[source]

Runs the Multi-Factor Analysis (MFA) pipeline.

Parameters:

  • symbols (list) – List of stock tickers to analyze.

  • start_date (str) – Start date for collecting financial data.

  • end_date (str) – End date for collecting financial data.

Returns:

Processed results including clustering, feature importance,

stress tests, and sensitivity analysis.

Return type:

dict

awt_quant.portfolio.multi_factor_analysis.main.symbols = ['AAPL', 'MSFT', 'GOOGL', 'RTX', 'LMT', 'BA', 'FANG', 'AMZN', 'TSLA', 'JPM', 'GS', 'JNJ', 'PFE',...[source]
